definition[0]: dealing with the outside appearance rather than the important part of something
example[0]: Weâ€™re making a few cosmetic changes to the house before we sell it.
example[1]: Many MPs denounced the resolution as a cosmetic exercise  (=something which will look good, but have no real effect).
definition[1]: intended to make your hair, skin, body etc look more attractive
example[4]: Are you on the diet for health or cosmetic reasons?
definition[2]: cosmetic changes are small and do not affect the most important parts of something
example[5]: Apart from a few minor cosmetic changes, the new model is basically the same as the old one.
